Ladies and gentlemen, I will implement telegram 991
of the Prime Minister. Minister Nguyen
Thanh Nghi has directed the ministry inspector to preside over the
development of plans and  instruct
localities to comprehensively inspect the
construction management activities of multi-
apartment housing, also known as mini apartments,
in recent years.
Minister Nguyen Thanh Nghi assigned the

rent in industrial parks with

a document requesting the People's Committee of the province and
city to
direct the relevant authorities to conduct inspections according to the
Ministry's inspection outline and report on actual results.
Report to the Ministry in December 2023 to
summarize and report to the Prime Minister.
Comprehensive inspection to detect and
handle violations of organizations and
individuals in investment, construction,
management, and apartment takeover.  In the
coming time, mini apartment complex will correct
this type of investment through inspection. The Ministry of Construction will

reality.  Investing in the construction and development of the
social housing system nationwide is a
correct policy of the Party and
State, but the implementation process is
showing the existence of
shortcomings in the draft housing law.  The change
is being hotly discussed by the National Assembly
at the meeting on Friday. Experts also
commented that many solutions are needed
to solve the fact that
this Trac is far from the traffic center, not very
convenient and lacks many
living benefits.  These are the reasons why few
customers choose this project as a place to
live. This is also a common situation in
many social housing projects in many
localities, many of which have
plans and schools.  There is a hospital,
but the hospital is still only on the
drawing board, there is no real life support
for people to use,
low profits, difficulty accessing capital also makes
investors not want to invest money. Many
opinions say that  It's time to
specifically stipulate in the law the responsibilities of
local governments in
planning long-term stable social housing
to attract businesses.  The driving
force for businesses is to
optimize costs. This is no
longer the responsibility of businesses but the
responsibility of local authorities.
Besides, improving
social infrastructure is also a factor.  It is
important to develop this housing segment
towards convenience and
sustainability. On the afternoon of October 26, police forces
in Ho Chi Minh City and Lam
Dong province conducted a series of inspections of
Thanh Buoi garage's offices in two locations.
This province also yesterday, the representative of the
Ho Chi Minh City Department of Transport
announced the results of the inspection of
compliance with regulations on business and
conditions for auto transport business
for garages.  Accordingly, Thanh Buoi does not
tolerate
illegal activities
according to the inspection results of the
City Department of Transport. Many
Thanh Buoi drivers drive continuously for more than 4 hours and
work too much during the day.  10 hours This is
against the road traffic law
because it will affect the driver's health
as well as the safety of the vehicle. In some cases,
drivers violate the law by not using the
driver's identification card to log in information according to
regulations.  Or use another driver's identification card
to log in information when
driving a passenger vehicle. There are many
cases of vehicles violating the speed limit five times
a month. In addition, the Department of Transport
also discovered many other violations.  of
Thanh Buoi bus station, the view of the
city leaders. The view of the transport industry leaders
here is that there is no such
thing as cover-up, there is no such
thing as tolerating
illegal activities to  leading to

coordinated with relevant units to
organize  Released more than 247,000 shrimp and fish
fingerlings in Duu Tien Lake to regenerate and restore
aquatic resources. Protect the
water environment. Contribute to supporting the livelihoods of
people exploiting fisheries.
Dau Tien Lake is an irrigation project.
important with a total area of ​​27,000 hectares and a
storage capacity of about 1.58 billion cubic meters of
water to serve multiple purposes. In recent years,
aquatic resources in Dau Tuong lake have
tended to decline in addition to
overexploitation in the past.  During the fish spawning season,
people still use
destructive fishing gear to
destroy the living environment, affecting the
aquatic resources in the lake. This year,
the Department of Agriculture will release 227.5 fish of all kinds
and 20,000 shrimp.  from today,
October 26 to November 26,
2023, this period of time is
the time to give fish time to
swim away from shore and at the same time
to develop before the Committee  The people of
Tay Ninh province have also issued a document
banning the exploitation and consumption of aquatic products in Dau
Tien lake for 1 month from October
26 to protect new breeds
released
about 1 month ago.
Hau Giang province is bought by traders at a rate of
75,000 to 80,000 VND per kg. At

Hanoi, the mother and child could not escape,
so they tragically died. The
current father  was undergoing emergency treatment in the
hospital. Initial information was that at 6:00 p.m. the same
day, people around heard a
loud explosion and calls for help, so they ran out to
check and discovered a fire in a
boarding house in the urban area of ​​Hong Ha Ecity
town.  Van Dien, people and
local authorities conducted firefighting and rescue
to control the fire from spreading.
Initially, it was determined that this is a scrap collection household with a
family of four. When the explosion occurred, the
husband was able to escape, but the fire
was quick to collapse the door of the house, trapping
his 31-year-old wife and two children,
12 and 5 years old, inside.
Local authorities determined that the
ill-fated mother and child had died according to
information from the police.  The husband used a
specialized scrap press machine when he pressed the
hair spray can, causing it to explode and ignite the
gas tank area, leading to a fire.
Thanh Tri district police are continuing to
coordinate with the authorities to investigate and clarify the cause.
On October 26, a collision between a
truck and a motorbike on Highway 1A in
Ham Thuan Nam district, Binh Thuan province
caused the death of a couple
at the time on the motorbike with
Ho Chi Minh City license plate driven by Nguyen Tam.
Thanh, born in 1991, was driving his wife
in the back seat on the road. When he
arrived at the above location, his motorbike had three

Nguyen Quoc Bao, born in 1982,
moving in the opposite direction.
headed across the road to rescue the couple, causing the couple to
die on the spot. The driver told them to
leave the scene and went to the police to report to the
police investigation agency.
Ham Thuan Nam district police came to examine the
scene to investigate the cause of the incident.
accident and requested an autopsy.
On October 26, 10
Dong Nai police forces in coordination with the working group of the
Traffic Police Department of the Ministry of Public Security
conducted inspections and discovered many
cases of car driving.  Motor tested positive for
drugs on Highway 20. This is
alarming information for traffic safety
on this vital road.
Specifically, the authorities blocked and
controlled measuring alcohol and drug levels for
drivers.  Cars and
motorbikes circulate in both directions on
Highway 20 through Dong Nai province. Through
inspection of more than 2,300 vehicles, the
authorities discovered and made records to
handle 74 cases of traffic violations.
including 40 cases of alcohol violation,
six cases of driving with
drugs in the body, one
case of using a fake driver's license, the rest were
speeding violations without a driver's license,

Provincial police investigation agency  announced that they have
decided to prosecute the case
against Ha Thi Thi, born in 1984, to
investigate the act of intentionally causing harm to the
health of
others, who are contract cooking staff and
students.  Boarding school of
Chu Van Thinh High School investigated
Ma Son district police and determined that due to dissatisfaction with the
school's choice of an
unreliable food supplier, there was an intention to
buy pesticides and insecticides.  Ants were
added to the food rations to cause poisoning to the
students, causing the Unit to change the
food supplier on September 22, mixing
medicine and boiled suu. However, when it was time to
distribute the rations to the students, the
kitchen management staff  When he discovered the smell of pesticides, he
reported it to the school administration,

became victims of

sentenced Defendant Nguyen Thi Kim Hanh, 10 years old,
